name: Babe!!
greetingText: I really like your name btw! ;)
wishText: Here’s to another year of you being you, and me loving every moment of it! 😘💖
textInChatBox: Hey love, happy birthday! 🥳💖 I’m so grateful for you and all the little...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something a bit more
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. ;)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
